#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

unsigned int nextPowerOf2(unsigned int n)
{
    n--;
    n |= n >> 1;
    n |= n >> 2;
    n |= n >> 4;
    n |= n >> 8;
    n |= n >> 16;
    n++;
    return n;
}

int main()
{
    int t,a,b,c,d,m;
    unsigned int x,y,X,Y,N;
    long long prod,dx,dy,rx,ry;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&m);
        prod = m;
        scanf("%d %d %d %d",&a,&b,&c,&d);
        scanf("%ld %ld",&x,&y);
        X = nextPowerOf2(x);
        Y = nextPowerOf2(y);
        N = (X>=Y)?X:Y;
        while(N>1)
        {
            N = N / 2;
            dx = x / N;
            dy = y / N;
            rx = x % N;
            ry = y % N;
            if(x<=N && y<=N)
                prod *= a;
            else if(x<=N && y<=2*N)
                prod *= b;
            else if(x<=2*N && y<=N)
                prod *= c;
            else
                prod *= d;
            if(!rx)
                x = N;
            else
                x = rx;
            if(!ry)
                y = N;
            else
                y = ry;

        }
        printf("%lld\n",prod);
    }
    return 0;
}
